body: Great art but fucked up end
masterpeice fk bitch
A piece of me was gone missing from reading this doujin.

Never have I rooted for a MC this much to get revenge. Since it's a fiction world, and the Boss from Saints Row could be literally anyone, I like to think every NTR became them, and paid the others back tenfold.
Trash ending for ntr story, same as always.
Fucking non sense

Shes not retard . a girl always soft. then , how a soft girl like wanna fight. do you think she can fight . all soft girl like her is slap only. the rapist , is that all? continue fucking until she broken . This is poor both of them
After reading this  just got immune to ntrshit  other ntrs are nothing but vanillas compare to this
That's nice seeing the author in the afterword trashing her own work, it's something you don't see much often

Always thought a nice revenge scenario for Yoshio would be him seducing their second kid(a girl,obviously) and marrying/deflowering her on her 18th birthday with Yoshiko and Carlos being forced to watch everything. He could even give her the engagement ring that he'd given to Yoshiko to bring the story full circle. To give it a nice lil twist, Yoshiko's parents would help him do this because she brought shame on them with how things went down when Carlos stole her.
Ok.
Man I want a story for the cucked dude, just a short thing or something poor dumb bastard
@ 7 Eyes I see that you are butthurt again vanillafag bitch LOL
Spanish* I put italian

There's multiple tragedies in all this xD

The artist is a woman who is very tired of making doujins and depressed cus they keep uploading her shit and she makes almost no money from her art work (she does have another job at least) so she won't be making anymore books except commisioned short stories/pictures or random art.

And despite her saying at the end she feels bad for putting yoshio through that- she still made more art (just random pics, no story) of this cunt and the italian guy together and if you didn't know any better you'd think it was top tier vanilla.

Sadly the worst part is her (artists) suicidal mentality and fuckery going on with her art
Yoshio, do you, like, know that the price for acid is kinda cheap?
Jezz, ¡what stupid girl!.

Hmm, I think ntr have lesser impact to me now than before, since I always thought the slut is just worthless and the MC doesn't even make it any better by being a chicken, so yea, grats Carlos and the slut, sad MC lol
Forgot to mention Carlos should be in jail, kidnapping someone without punishment is fucking stupid.  The background need more work too.
She could have just broken up with him at the beginning.  Everything feels forced.  She hot, but retarded.
And I'm actually pretty open minded when it comes to stories/plots in hentai.

This is the first NTR manga that I have read so far which made me sick to the core. Made me cry and hope that people who can't respect those in a relationship and those who can't stay loyal and faithful can just go and disappear from the face of the earth. 
I know this is a work of fiction and just the imagination of the mangaka but damn I can't help but feel disgusted with the story. It would have been better if the girl after that moment regretted it and at least showed remorse and being guilty. And this kind of thing happens in real life too. Must be why I'm so agitated and came to despise this.
The art is beautiful but I personally still can't and won't forgive the story.
Sad story, super amazing art style. Why NTR has to be alway go with good art like this ... It's ... feel both nice and painful at the same time :'(
NICE! TYTYTYTYTY :)

@Lolrider: LOL... I agree but then again, this is a work of fiction whom the mangaka can do whatever the fuck he want. Personally, I do like the premise. And I do like NTR in which the spouse finds out that his significant other has been cheating on him. Good argument though.

I think what bothers me about a lot of NTR stories like this, is that it makes it seem like the woman is brain-dead.  "Before I knew it I was sucking his cock over and over again" wtf???  How does that work?  Human beings can't be lobotomized by dick.
Honestly the impetus for these stories make no sense to me.  Shit like this doesn't happen, I hate when NTR writers phone it in with stuff like this.  Give me an actual story or don't waste my time.
I like the chick... She's hot!!!
